segments.advisor_message: So, let's start off with some basics. Can you tell me your full name, please? I need to know your first name, any middle names you might have, and your last name.
segments.client_message: Sure, my name is Emily Jordan. But I usually go by Em, you know, just more casual.

segments.advisor_message: Great, Em. I also need to gather some more details like your date of birth and maybe where you were born. Could you share that with me?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I was born on 15-04-1990 in Boston. Just a small city, you know?
